name: Vampanzer
description:
Vampanzer was created for the A Game By It's Cover 2018 game jam. This game is based on the "Vampanzer" Famicart by Liam Higgins. I'll use their original game description because that's what enticed me into making this game in the first place, I thought it was a super rad idea, and I wish I had more time to do what I originally planned for this game but one day I just might. 

Anyhow:

"HallowVania has been invaded.
King Dracula has been kidnapped.
Our last hope rests with the princess.
Only she can pilot the Vampanzer."
